law.catch_line: Lay-off rules applicable to both classified and unclassified employees.
law.history: Amended 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 78, sec. 25, effective June 25, 2009. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 154, sec. 30, effective July 15, 1998; and ch. 487, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 387, sec. 30, effective July 15, 1994. -- Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 494, sec. 6, effective July 15, 1986.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/15/98). This section was amended by 1998 Ky. Acts chs. 154 and 487. Where these Acts are not in conflict, they have been codified together. Where a conflict exists, Acts ch. 487, which was last enacted by the General Assembly, prevails under KRS 446.250.
